root: ^You pick up the phone and are greeted the a warm and loving voice of your mom

Negative: ^Mom: I'm sesnsing sarcasim. I'm not sure if you're being serious or no-
^Riley: So how's your trip mom, everything going alrgiht??
^Mom: Everything is great... but that not why I called. I called to check up on you, I know the news aren't the best new you've gotten this week. Are you sure you don't wanna talk
^You're not here anyway mom, how will i talk to you
^Nope, I've already spoken to Ezra about it so I'm good.
P1: ^Mom: Just because i'm not there doesn't mean we cant talk.
^Riley: It hasnt been easy mom, not at all. After i got out of sergery this morning I couldn't help but think if i'll ever be as good as before.
^It's not easy being someone who portrayed themself as strong, fealess and almost invincible.
^Now look at me, injured, helpless and weak.

^Mom: Listen to me Riley, you're not weak. The fact that you had the courgae to opt for the surgery to help heal your knee takes a lot of courage. Having a minor setback isn't a weakness... and the fact that you gathered the courage to talk to me about how you feel says alot about you will to push and get better

^Mom: You may even comeback 10x stronger than you were before, hell even a better athlete than before. What I'm saying is asking for help isn't a weakness, asking to talk about how you fell isnt a weakness, and I know for a fact you're going to get back out there and kick ass.
^You pause as your mom's words of encouragement sink in and wonder throught you mind.
^Riley: Wow mom i didn't think you had it in you... you go girl!!
^You both laugh as you share a sweet mother daughter moment.
^Riley: In all honesty i think these are words i need to hear from you mom. It really means alot to me that you know when to say the right thing even though you aren't physically here to support me.
^Mom: You know I've always got you my baby.
^Riley: moooooomm, I told you to stop calling me that
N1: ^Mom: Oh okay then... i guess my little baby doesn't need me after all
^Riley: Moooomm... I told you to stop caliing me that
^Mom: Well i'm your mom and i can do whatever i want.
^You both laugh and pause for a bit.
Postive: ^Mom: Okay Ri,spit it out what on your mind. I know for sure this isn't how you talk and you've just been hit with a massive missile.
^I'm handling it pretty well i guess...
^Ezra's here to help so you have nothing to worry about
N2: ^Mom: Okay your highness. I see you don't need me anymore
^Riley: You're kinda half way across the world soooo...
^You both laugh and there's a short duration of silence.
Cont: ^Mom: Okay so I've called Dr Harthorn, she referred you to a physiotherapist. Her name's Dr Andrews she'll be helping you with your recovery plan.
^Riley: Okay cool. So when do i meet her??
^Mom: Tomorrow at 10:30am. So you need to be ready by then. I 'll speak to Ezra and he'll take you there.
p3: ^Alright my sweets i have to get some sleep I have a big meeting tomorrow. Don't foret to smile.
^Riley:Got it mom. I'll try to smile. Love you.
^You hang up the phone and head to bed
N3: ^Mom: Okay sweets. have a good rest. I've got a big meeting tomorrow so i have to get ready for that. We'll talk soon.
^You hang up the phone and head to bed
